actions.in_committee: House Committee on Education and the Workforce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Education Reform.

official_title: To authorize appropriations for the Individuals with Disabilities Education Act to achieve full funding in fiscal year 2004 and fiscal year 2005, and for other purposes.
short_title: IDEA Keeping Our Commitment Act of 2003

summary.text: IDEA Keeping Our Commitment Act of 2003 - Amends the Individuals with Disabilities Education Act (IDEA) to authorize appropriations in specified amounts for FY 2004 and 2005 to reach the Federal Government's goal of providing 40 percent of the national average per pupil expenditure for the purpose of educating all children with disabilities in those fiscal years.

titles.title: IDEA Keeping Our Commitment Act of 2003
To authorize appropriations for the Individuals with Disabilities Education Act to achieve full funding in fiscal year 2004 and fiscal year 2005, and for other purposes.
